reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MECH 223, MECH 260.
Co-reqs: All of MECH 325, MECH 360 and one of MECH 328, ENPH 253, IGEN 330.
description: Design of shafts and welded joints. Fatigue and fracture considerations in design: failure types, failure under static and dynamic loading, fatigue failure, crack initiation, and propagation. Introduction to the FEM in mechanical design.
